extendedHelp: This command is designed to manage giveaways. You can start them with this command by giving it the time and a title.
When a giveaway has been created, I will send a giveaway message and react to it with ðŸŽ‰ so the members of the server can participate on it.
You can pass a flag of `--winners=Xw`, wherein X is a number (for example 2w for 2 winners) to allow multiple people to win a giveaway.
Please note that there is a maximum of 25 winners.
explainedUsage: (Optional) The channel in which to start the giveaway
The time the giveaway should last.

giveawayRerollDescription: Re-roll the winners from a giveaway.

giveawayRerollExtended.extendedHelp: This command is designed to re-roll finished giveaways. Please check `Skyra, help gstart` for more information about creating one.
explainedUsage: The amount of winners to pick.
The message to target. Defaults to last giveaway message.

giveawayScheduleDescription: Schedule a giveaway to start at a certain time.

extendedHelp: This command prepares a giveaway to start at a certain time if you do not wish to start it immediately.
You can pass a flag of `--winners=X`, wherein X is a number, to allow multiple people to win this giveaway.
Please note that there is a maximum of 25 winners.
explainedUsage: (Optional) The channel in which to start the giveaway
The time to wait before starting the giveaway.
The time the giveaway should last.

giveawayRerollInvalid: The message ID does not exist or there is no finished giveaway.
